resources.string: Require users to authenticate as the owner of the phone before using the app. Prompts for fingerprint or passcode when the app first opens and when the app has been in the background for more than 5 minutes.
Blur the app when itâ€™s set to background to protect any confidential on-screen information, it also prevents taking screenshots of the app.
Disable app launch on Jailbroken or rooted devices.
Disable the ability to copy from or paste into any text inputs in the app.
Set a default Mattermost server URL.
Allow the user to change the above server URL.
Set the username or email address to use to authenticate against the Mattermost Server.
Name of the EMM vendor or company deploying the app. Used in help text when prompting for passcodes so users are aware why the app is being protected.
